analysis.description:
WeBetCrypto (/unique_chucks/14/0x03c18d649e743ee0b09f28a81d33575f03af9826.sol#9-738) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/14/0x03c18d649e743ee0b09f28a81d33575f03af9826.sol#219-234)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/14/0x03c18d649e743ee0b09f28a81d33575f03af9826.sol#244-247)
empty in WeBetCrypto.transfer (/unique_chucks/14/0x03c18d649e743ee0b09f28a81d33575f03af9826.sol#274-275) is a local variable never initialiazed

WeBetCrypto.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0x03c18d649e743ee0b09f28a81d33575f03af9826.sol#417-427) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(admin,balance) (/unique_chucks/14/0x03c18d649e743ee0b09f28a81d33575f03af9826.sol#425)

Reentrancy in WeBetCrypto.transferToContract (/unique_chucks/14/0x03c18d649e743ee0b09f28a81d33575f03af9826.sol#344-357):
	External calls:
	- rec.tokenFallback(msg.sender,_value,_data) (/unique_chucks/14/0x03c18d649e743ee0b09f28a81d33575f03af9826.sol#353-354)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isAdded (/unique_chucks/14/0x03c18d649e743ee0b09f28a81d33575f03af9826.sol#355-357)
	- monthlyLimit (/unique_chucks/14/0x03c18d649e743ee0b09f28a81d33575f03af9826.sol#355-357)
	- users (/unique_chucks/14/0x03c18d649e743ee0b09f28a81d33575f03af9826.sol#355-357)

WeBetCrypto.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/14/0x03c18d649e743ee0b09f28a81d33575f03af9826.sol#294-297)
	- /unique_chucks/14/0x03c18d649e743ee0b09f28a81d33575f03af9826.sol#295-297

WeBetCrypto.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0x03c18d649e743ee0b09f28a81d33575f03af9826.sol#17-18)
WeBetCrypto.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0x03c18d649e743ee0b09f28a81d33575f03af9826.sol#10-11)
WeBetCrypto.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0x03c18d649e743ee0b09f28a81d33575f03af9826.sol#11-13)
WeBetCrypto.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0x03c18d649e743ee0b09f28a81d33575f03af9826.sol#20-21)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/14/0x03c18d649e743ee0b09f28a81d33575f03af9826.sol#567-569:
	- Usage of "msg.gas" should be replaced with "gasleft()"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/14/0x03c18d649e743ee0b09f28a81d33575f03af9826.sol#613-620:
	- Usage of "msg.gas" should be replaced with "gasleft()"
WeBetCrypto.tokenFallback (/unique_chucks/14/0x03c18d649e743ee0b09f28a81d33575f03af9826.sol#382) should be declared external
WeBetCrypto.fallback (/unique_chucks/14/0x03c18d649e743ee0b09f28a81d33575f03af9826.sol#716-717) should be declared external

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/14/0x03c18d649e743ee0b09f28a81d33575f03af9826.sol:
